2020-01-22 retro

Look back at fragments of the day

I'm always interested in what old art really looked like. So much of our view is informed by previous generations tinkering, not the original creators vision - https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-51205614

Terry Jones died today

This, https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/18/technology/clearview-privacy-facial-recognition.html, is how we'll end up with the "scramble suits" from 'A Scanner Darkly'. Sometimes I hate how much Sci-Fi I read is now coming to fruition.

Meta
